title: Andrew Sheets: Pressure Testing the “Overoptimistic Markets” Argument
description: The sharp rebound in stock and corporate bond markets has made some question if markets are a bit too upbeat about a speedy recovery. There’s just one problem with this view.
itunes:title: Andrew Sheets: Pressure Testing the “Overoptimistic Markets” Argument
